item.title: Latin America Is Shifting Right and Toward the U.S.
item.description: The trend vindicates President Trump’s decision to reassert influence in Latin America.

item.description: If Casey DeSantis passes on the Florida governor’s race, the incumbent will find himself at a crossroads.

item.title: The ‘Mostly Peaceful’ Riots Are Back
item.description: Portland wasn’t alone, as local protesters clashed with local police over the weekend.

item.title: NPR and PBS Never Needed Your Taxpayer Dollars
item.description: ‘Vanishingly few’ stations have shuttered so far. Surprised?
